programme.review: --- Actors: Christian Bale (role=John Preston), Dominic Purcell (role=Seamus), Sean Bean (role=Partridge), Christian Kahrmann (role=Officer in Charge), John Keogh (role=Chemist), Sean Pertwee (role=Father), William Fichtner (role=Jurgen), Angus Macfadyen (role=Dupont), David Barrash (role=Evidentiary Storage Officer), Dirk Martens (role=Gate Guard), Taye Diggs (role=Brandt), Matthew Harbour (role=Robbie Preston)

IMDb data; ttnr: 0238380, Title: Equilibrium, --- Description: Equilibrium: Directed by Kurt Wimmer. With Christian Bale, Dominic Purcell, Sean Bean, Christian Kahrmann. In an oppressive future where all forms of feeling are illegal, a man in charge of enforcing the law rises to overthrow the system and state." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0238380/","name":"Equilibrium","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkzMzA1OTI3N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMzUyMDg5._V1_.jpg","description":"In an oppressive future where all forms of feeling are illegal, a man in charge of enforcing the law rises to overthrow the system and state.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0238380/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Anonymous_Maxine","dateCreated":"2008-03-23","inLanguage":"English","name":""Equilibrium" is really hard to type.","reviewBody":"I bought Equilibrium just because Christian Bale is in it. To tell you the truth I was certain that it was going to be a goofy, direct-to-video sci-fi fiasco that most involved would just as soon forget. The cover box reminded me of Universal Soldier. As it turns out however, it's not a movie that those involved want to forget, it's an overlooked gem, no doubt because it came at the height of the Matrix craze, which it may resemble in too many ways. Unfortunately, too many people will callously write it off as a Matrix rip-off, and it's a shame because this is one of the best science fiction films to have come along in quite some time. 

It takes place in the far off 21st century, but it's not about the future (given that it exists in a future that can't ever exist), it's about the disturbing reality that war is a part of human nature, and in order to eradicate it from the modern world we would have to become a homogenized society of emotionless, drug-controlled zombies. No jokes about that already being a reality.

The movie's biggest assertion is that it assigns blame for man's inhumanity to man to his ability to feel (ignoring the real causes, such as religion, political power, and less dogmatic things like national pride and human rights). The current government is based on enforcing the mass removal of emotion from the masses using a drug called Prozium, and is the source of the movie's main irony, that in order to eradicate war, it has waged war on all of it's own citizens, who constantly live under close surveillance. 

The government employs Grammaton Clerics to handle that surveillance. They are highly trained officers authorized to kill anyone they deem to be "sense offenders" on the spot ("I trust you'll be more vigilant in the future?"). There is, in fact, a staggering amount of irony in the film, given that all emotion or feeling is strictly forbidden under penalty of death, and yet anger, suspicion and fear are all alive and well, and even flaunted. It's also interesting to consider that in real life it is the dogmatic, Cleric-like believers who aspire for war, and the normal people who just want to live their lives. 

For the most part the movie ignores the fact that it is governments that wage war, not citizens (even emotionally sensitive ones), but no matter. The important thing that you need to know about the movie is that it goes way, way too far, and because of that, it's fun. I cheered out loud several times during the film because the gun fights, which are so unrealistic it's almost funny, are genuinely well-choreographed and exciting. If I may say so, this is what gun fights in hard core science fiction movies should look like.

Many people criticize the movie for being unrealistic or too extreme, altogether forgetting what kind of movie they're watching in the first place. The movie is not about moral dilemmas, even though the main character suffers a tremendous one, it's a fast, gritty science fiction movie that makes no apologies, and owes none. The characterization may be just a little heavy (Bale's character going from not understanding a question about what he felt when his wife was incinerated to having a soft spot for puppies, etc.), but like another outstanding and equally over-the-top film, Shoot 'Em Up, nothing is out of place. All of the excesses look right at home. 

It is interesting to consider the real-world implications of the content of the movie though, regardless of how unrealistic it is. The totalitarian regime, for example, resembles Mao Tse- tung's manner of oppression with startling closeness, even down to the children spying on and reporting their parents. Under Mao, children who reported their parents engaging in "counter'-revolutionary activities" were publicly hailed as national heroes while their parents were generally tortured and executed. Whether the crimes were real or not was unimportant, what mattered is that, as you can imagine, in a society where people were so easily made to desperately fear their own children, you can imagine the level of control the government (Mao) had over the people. Something similar happens in this movie.

The similarities to The Matrix films are obvious, but limited mostly to superficial things like the fight scenes and some costumes. Thematically, the movies are totally different, and even with all of the similarities, this movie is more than able to stand on its own, and any similarities are more just an unfortunate bit of timing, as this is probably what caused the movie to be so overlooked. If you can't handle a little excess in the movies, definitely stay away from this one. But if you can watch a movie just for a good time, you could do a lot worse than this.

programme.title: Norbit
Norbit
programme.desc:
Norbit: Directed by Brian Robbins. With Eddie Murphy, Thandiwe Newton, Terry Crews, Clifton Powell. A mild-mannered guy, who is married to a monstrous woman, meets the woman of his dreams, and schemes to find a way to be with her." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0477051/","name":"Norbit","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI4NDE4MjgyNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTQwODc0MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A mild-mannered guy, who is married to a monstrous woman, meets the woman of his dreams, and schemes to find a way to be with her.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0477051/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"maestro-20"},"dateCreated":"2007-02-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not his best, but not his worst either","reviewBody":"Yes, the movie is racist and politically incorrect, but you know what? I think many people are offended because they miss the point. Brian Robbins and Eddie Murphy would be stupid to make a racist movie -- instead, they are making fun of it. Anyone who has seen a South Park episode would understand "satire" instead of calling it racist, homophobic, or whatever. I think that's what Eddie Murphy was trying to do here -- to poke fun at our own prejudices.

As a film, Norbit only succeeds halfway. It has some hilarious moments, but the film is unfocused and inconsistent. The script is bad, but I guess if you're used to comedies like Epic Movies, you'll be okay with bad comedy scripts. The stereotypes are so blatant and obvious that they are funny. When Mr. Wong (Murphy) said, "Of course I am racist!" he had a point. In a way, we are all prejudiced; we just don't want to admit to it.

Judging from the reaction of a packed theater on a Sunday night (blacks, whites, Asians, men, women, thin people, overweight people), I think people can have a good time with this one if they put aside their political correctness. It's just another crude, raunchy, silly comedy. And Eddie Murphy is funny as hell.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":71983,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2007-03-21","keywords":"character name as title,man wears eyeglasses,woman hits a man,paramount,splash","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Norbit","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi228196633","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTdiY2JmMzktOTkzZi00YWE2LWFhYjgtMWYyZWI0ZDBlZDQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTdiY2JmMzktOTkzZi00YWE2LWFhYjgtMWYyZWI0ZDBlZDQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Dreamworks"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000552/","name":"Eddie Murphy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0628601/","name":"Thandiwe Newton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0187719/","name":"Terry Crews"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005367/","name":"Brian Robbins"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022730/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0099647/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000552/","name":"Eddie Murphy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0614151/","name":"Charlie Murphy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0771065/","name":"Jay Scherick"}],"duration":"PT1H43M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Vanilla Sky: Directed by Cameron Crowe. With Tom Cruise, Penélope Cruz, Cameron Diaz, Kurt Russell. A self-indulgent and vain publishing magnate finds his privileged life upended after a vehicular accident with a resentful lover." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0259711/","name":"Vanilla Sky","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzFlMTJjYzUtMWFjYy00NjkyLTg1Y2EtYmZkMjdlOGQ1ZGYwL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A self-indulgent and vain publishing magnate finds his privileged life upended after a vehicular accident with a resentful lover.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0259711/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jensenj49"},"dateCreated":"2020-09-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"I still say It's the Vanilla Sky at sunset these days","reviewBody":"This movie was so divisive. People either loved it or despised it. You can either accept the ending or you can't. The movie really makes you think and wonder, "what's going on?" You are not always supposed to know what is going on. A lot of people do not want to have to think too much lol. Great movie, good soundtrack. I love rarely when movies change the way you listen to a song. Good Vibrations by the Beach Boys came across in the moment as so eerie, I still think of that now when i hear it. It is a movie that is definitely worth watching.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":256359,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Fantasy","Mystery","Romance"],"datePublished":"2002-01-23","keywords":"dream,death,mask,nightmare,mental institution","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Vanilla Sky","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3806331161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWM4YTZjZTEtMmM5My00ZTEyLWE2MWUtM2M0OWI4ZTNkNzhkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWM4YTZjZTEtMmM5My00ZTEyLWE2MWUtM2M0OWI4ZTNkNzhkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Paramount"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000129/","name":"Tom Cruise"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004851/","name":"Penélope Cruz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000139/","name":"Cameron Diaz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001081/","name":"Cameron Crowe"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0012382/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047730/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0024622/","name":"Alejandro Amenábar"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0317834/","name":"Mateo Gil"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001081/","name":"Cameron Crowe"}],"duration":"PT2H16M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Bank Job
Pljačka
programme.desc: The Bank Job: Directed by Roger Donaldson. With Jason Statham, Saffron Burrows, Stephen Campbell Moore, Daniel Mays. Martine offers Terry a lead on a foolproof bank hit on London's Baker Street. She targets a roomful of safe deposit boxes worth millions in cash and jewelry along with a treasure trove of dirty secrets." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0200465/","name":"The Bank Job","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmE2NzEyOWItYjI1ZC00YWZhLWI2MjEtZmU1NjIyNjliOTkyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Martine offers Terry a lead on a foolproof bank hit on London's Baker Street. She targets a roomful of safe deposit boxes worth millions in cash and jewelry along with a treasure trove of dirty secrets.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0200465/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jkeggen"},"dateCreated":"2008-02-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"A very good British Film","reviewBody":"I also saw this film at an advance screening. I don't normally watch any of the trailers before going, so tend to go in with an open mind. I was very pleasantly surprised, and while it perhaps won't win any Oscars, I thought it was well acted in the main with some faces you'll recognise. It might not have massive appeal outside the UK, however it is a good (based on fact) story. I'm not a massive fan of 70's music, but it wouldn't have done any harm to have a bit more in the background just to give it more of a seventies feel about it. The general mood of the film was good and for me seemed to set the scene well, without going overboard with sex or violence. On the whole, it's well worth a visit, even if you have never lived in that era.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177819,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2009-01-28","keywords":"safe deposit,heist,chase,mobster,london england","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005458/","name":"Jason Statham"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004787/","name":"Saffron Burrows"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1304386/","name":"Stephen Campbell Moore"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002044/","name":"Roger Donaldson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0037759/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0239107/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0166074/","name":"Dick Clement"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0478588/","name":"Ian La Frenais"}],"duration":"PT1H51M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: We Were Soldiers
Bili smo vojnici
programme.desc: We Were Soldiers: Directed by Randall Wallace. With Mel Gibson, Madeleine Stowe, Greg Kinnear, Sam Elliott. The story of the first major battle of the American phase of the Vietnam War, and the soldiers on both sides that fought it, while their wives wait nervously and anxiously at home for the good news or the bad news." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0277434/","name":"We Were Soldiers","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTk3NTc4MTktNjFmZC00ZjdjLWE0ZjgtNTM4NzdmMDBjOTcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDkzNTM2ODg@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of the first major battle of the American phase of the Vietnam War, and the soldiers on both sides that fought it, while their wives wait nervously and anxiously at home for the good news or the bad news.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0277434/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ggraziano"},"dateCreated":"2003-06-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Mixed feelings","reviewBody":"We Were Soldiers is not for the squeamish. It ranks up there with Saving Private Ryan for realistically showing the brutality of war. I was moved almost beyond description by the ordeal these 390-odd US Army Air Cav soldiers endured at the hands of thousands of Viet Cong troops. It is as close to Hell as one could get on earth--a charnel house of horrors, where death is sudden and swift. Mel Gibson and Sam Elliot lead a group of green recruits into the Valley Of Death on an impossible mission in the early days of our involvement in Vietnam.\n\nBased on actual events in 1965, this was the first major involvement of US troops and North Vietnamese regulars. The writing, directing, and acting are first rate, and the battle scenes are too real for comfort. What really makes the mind reel is that after the slaughter depicted in this film, Mel's character Lt. Col. Hal Moore goes back to the valley of death for more than 200 days. The American dead are listed on 3 East of the Vietnam Memorial Wall. I stood at attention and cried when the names of the fallen were listed at the end of the film. You will, too."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":135635,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2002-04-24","keywords":"battle,soldier,vietnam war,helicopter,based on true story","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"We Were Soldiers","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi451019033","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzY1OWMzYWItNDllMS00NTQ2LWI0YzMtY2FmZWFmMjlmZmUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzY1OWMzYWItNDllMS00NTQ2LWI0YzMtY2FmZWFmMjlmZmUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Paramount Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000154/","name":"Mel Gibson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000656/","name":"Madeleine Stowe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001427/","name":"Greg Kinnear"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0908824/","name":"Randall Wallace"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000700/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0089335/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1051840/","name":"Harold G. programme.title: The Saint
Svetac
programme.desc: The Saint: Directed by Phillip Noyce. With Val Kilmer, Elisabeth Shue, Rade Serbedzija, Valeriy Nikolaev. Simon Templar (The Saint), is a thief for hire, whose latest job to steal the secret process for cold fusion puts him at odds with a traitor bent on toppling the Russian government, as well as the woman who holds its secret." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0120053/","name":"The Saint","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmM3MjI2YjUtYjk1MS00M2VjLWI4MmUtM2UyYWQyNTVlZGE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc1NTYyMjg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Simon Templar (The Saint), is a thief for hire, whose latest job to steal the secret process for cold fusion puts him at odds with a traitor bent on toppling the Russian government, as well as the woman who holds its secret.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120053/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dcobbimdb"},"dateCreated":"2004-10-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pleasantly surprised","reviewBody":"Maybe my expectations were too low going in after reading a slue of terrible reviews, but I thought it was a good solid movie and very entertaining. Val Kilmer was great in his disguises and rolls. Elisabeth Shue was attractive as ever and played her part well. The movie kept on a continual pace, and kept the action and suspense throughout. There were a few things I thought were lame and it got a little unrealistic at times, but all in all it was a good solid movie. Maybe even a good action / romance date movie. If you haven't seen it (as I hadn't until today), give it a try. It has action, suspense, romance, and a little comedy thrown in for good measure. It runs in at just about 2 hours long, so long enough to get a good plot, some twists & turns and yet not bore you. There will always be people that pick plot holes in movies and just love proving that it's road kill. If you're one of those people, maybe you should stay away, but if you want a good entertaining popcorn movie it's worth a watch."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":65876,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Romance"],"datePublished":"1997-04-04","keywords":"cold fusion,knights templar,russophobia,propaganda,cranberry","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000174/","name":"Val Kilmer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000223/","name":"Elisabeth Shue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0784884/","name":"Rade Serbedzija"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0637518/","name":"Phillip Noyce"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030480/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026101/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0153546/","name":"Leslie Charteris"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0378144/","name":"Jonathan Hensleigh"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0834338/","name":"Wesley Strick"}],"duration":"PT1H56M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Cable Guy
Nepodnošljivi gnjavator
programme.desc:
The Cable Guy: Directed by Ben Stiller. With Jim Carrey, Matthew Broderick, Leslie Mann, Jack Black. A lonely and mentally disturbed cable guy raised on television just wants a new friend, but his target, a designer, rejects him, with bad consequences." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0115798/","name":"The Cable Guy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzE3ZTc5ZjctN2RhZS00NTljLWFkNzgtYWQ1ZjA2NTJmOWE4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjE5MjUyOTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A lonely and mentally disturbed cable guy raised on television just wants a new friend, but his target, a designer, rejects him, with bad consequences.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0115798/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ametaphysicalshark"},"dateCreated":"2007-03-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Carrey's best comedic performance, and a terrific dark comedy","reviewBody":"Jim Carrey has only been better than this in two movies, "Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind", and "Man on the Moon", but both were more or less dramatic roles. Aside from the classic "Dumb and Dumber", none of his comedy roles can even begin to compare to his superb, electric performance here. Most people I know don't really enjoy this, but that's because they can't really relate, or they don't want to. Carrey plays 'Chip Douglas' (which might be his real name, or it might not), a Cable Guy brought up on TV and movies. His performance works so well because he normally goes too far with his antics, making himself seem annoying on occasion, rather than funny. Here, he plays a lunatic, so there are no limits for him to adhere to, and where he would normally seem over the top (the Medieval Times sequence), he is genuinely hilarious.

Now, I might not be a cable guy, but I'd be lying if I said that I don't spew lines from random movies out of nowhere, and I'd be lying if I said I didn't have an obsession. Maybe it makes fellow fanatics a bit unsettled to see themselves compared to maniacs like Chip (which is probably why the critics assaulted this as well). Although this is by and large Carrey's movie, there is no doubt that Matthew Broderick, Jack Black, and Leslie Mann help elevate this film further with excellent performances. Ben Stiller has directed a few other films, but none of them even come close to matching this. He keeps a perfect balance between the dark and the funny, so "The Cable Guy" doesn't come across as too mean or sadistic. He also shows up in a running gag as a former child star from a cheesy old sitcom who shoots his own brother and goes to court, a trial whose verdict is highly anticipated by pretty much everyone. Owen Wilson has another great cameo as a cocky ass who takes Steven's (Broderick) girlfriend (Mann) on a date and gets assaulted by Chip when he goes to the washroom.

I have never seen a movie like "The Cable Guy", and chances are you haven't either. This is a great movie and one of my personal favorites. It's important you don't watch this expecting a cheery slapstick comedy. If you know what to expect, this will be a fun time.

IMDb data; ttnr: 0115798, Title: The Cable Guy, --- Description: The Cable Guy: Directed by Ben Stiller. With Jim Carrey, Matthew Broderick, Leslie Mann, Jack Black. A lonely and mentally disturbed cable guy raised on television just wants a new friend, but his target, a designer, rejects him, with bad consequences." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0115798/","name":"The Cable Guy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzE3ZTc5ZjctN2RhZS00NTljLWFkNzgtYWQ1ZjA2NTJmOWE4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjE5MjUyOTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A lonely and mentally disturbed cable guy raised on television just wants a new friend, but his target, a designer, rejects him, with bad consequences.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0115798/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ametaphysicalshark","dateCreated":"2007-03-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Carrey's best comedic performance, and a terrific dark comedy","reviewBody":"Jim Carrey has only been better than this in two movies, "Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind", and "Man on the Moon", but both were more or less dramatic roles. Aside from the classic "Dumb and Dumber", none of his comedy roles can even begin to compare to his superb, electric performance here. Most people I know don't really enjoy this, but that's because they can't really relate, or they don't want to. Carrey plays 'Chip Douglas' (which might be his real name, or it might not), a Cable Guy brought up on TV and movies. His performance works so well because he normally goes too far with his antics, making himself seem annoying on occasion, rather than funny. Here, he plays a lunatic, so there are no limits for him to adhere to, and where he would normally seem over the top (the Medieval Times sequence), he is genuinely hilarious.

Now, I might not be a cable guy, but I'd be lying if I said that I don't spew lines from random movies out of nowhere, and I'd be lying if I said I didn't have an obsession. Maybe it makes fellow fanatics a bit unsettled to see themselves compared to maniacs like Chip (which is probably why the critics assaulted this as well). Although this is by and large Carrey's movie, there is no doubt that Matthew Broderick, Jack Black, and Leslie Mann help elevate this film further with excellent performances. Ben Stiller has directed a few other films, but none of them even come close to matching this. He keeps a perfect balance between the dark and the funny, so "The Cable Guy" doesn't come across as too mean or sadistic. He also shows up in a running gag as a former child star from a cheesy old sitcom who shoots his own brother and goes to court, a trial whose verdict is highly anticipated by pretty much everyone. Owen Wilson has another great cameo as a cocky ass who takes Steven's (Broderick) girlfriend (Mann) on a date and gets assaulted by Chip when he goes to the washroom.

I have never seen a movie like "The Cable Guy", and chances are you haven't either. This is a great movie and one of my personal favorites. It's important you don't watch this expecting a cheery slapstick comedy. If you know what to expect, this will be a fun time.

programme.title: Alexander
Aleksandar Veliki
programme.desc: Alexander: Directed by Oliver Stone. With Anthony Hopkins, David Bedella, Jessie Kamm, Angelina Jolie. Alexander, the King of Macedonia and one of the greatest army leaders in the history of warfare, conquers much of the known world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0346491/","name":"Alexander","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA1NDQ3OTY2NDVeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDI5MDc0MzM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Alexander, the King of Macedonia and one of the greatest army leaders in the history of warfare, conquers much of the known world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0346491/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"andros12"},"dateCreated":"2004-12-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"I believe this beautiful, exotic film will become a collectible much like "Satyricon."","reviewBody":"This film presents an intense psychological investigation of the character of Alexander of Macedon. It is thoroughly immersed in the moral, political and philosophical climate of Grecian antiquity, In many ways it bears somewhat of a resemblance to Fellini's "Satyricon" of thirty-five years earlier. There is the similar re-appearance of the Cyclops-like characters, the shrew-like "luna" characters with their sensual but corresponding dark sides, a "token" love garden, the tinted filter/lens effect on specific scenes and the stunning "pagan" beauty evident in the set design. It also features male leads who share a code of honour and love between them. A love which in its "highest" spiritual form was representative as a means of transcendent personal growth and valor; ideas passed down from Plato to Aristotle. Chronological occurrences of Alexander's campaigns and political successes take a back seat as a result, disappointing many more intent on an all-inclusive rendering from this perspective. The variety of spoken accents form a type of "primordial soup" much like Fellini used in "Satyricon" as well; a curiosity thought by some to be symbolic of Jung and his theories of a "collective unconscious" wherein all language is simply an outward babbling to personify the universally shared life experience of all people. There were some cosmetic concerns, most notably Alexander's badly tinted hair and eyebrows. The excessive black eyeliner worn by Hephaestion is a look that does appear periodically on vases and frescoes. However, underneath all of the controversy lies the character of a deeply passionate man with his seemingly many strengths and weaknesses, attempting to grow and to love without limitation in accordance with his own perspective and level of understanding. Kudos to Colin for possessing the maturity and depth to present Alexander's complex personality and feelings with so much intensity and dignity.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":166405,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Biography","Drama"],"datePublished":"2004-12-01","keywords":"ancient greece,greek,gay,macedonia,animal in cast credits","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Alexander (2004)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2511667481","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDFmMmRmZDktNWMxZS00ODI4LWJjZTYtODExODc0M2YxYjlkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDFmMmRmZDktNWMxZS00ODI4LWJjZTYtODExODc0M2YxYjlkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Warner Home Video"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0268199/","name":"Colin Farrell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000164/","name":"Anthony Hopkins"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0206257/","name":"Rosario Dawson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000231/","name":"Oliver Stone"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010183/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0112880/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000231/","name":"Oliver Stone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0477370/","name":"Christopher Kyle"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0436164/","name":"Laeta Kalogridis"}],"duration":"PT2H55M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Lëvizja jote
programme.desc: Një vrasës me pagesë i tërhequr nga profesioni, detyrohet të lërë jetën e qetë dhe të rizgjojë të gjitha aftësitë e tij vrasëse, kur një bos i drogës merr peng mbesën e tij.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Domino
programme.desc: Regjia: Tony Scott; Aktorët: Keira Knightley, Mickey Rourke, Edgar Ramirez. E zgjuar, rebele dhe e bukur; kjo është historia e vërtetë e Domino Harvit, vajzës së rritur mes luksit dhe privilegjeve që lë gjithçka për t'u bërë gjahtare shpërblimesh.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Lufta e yjeve IV
programme.desc: Kaloresit Xhedaj qe kane mbetur pa u shfarosur do te luftojne per te rimarre galaktiken e tyre me ne krye princeshen Leia e cila do te kete nje kundershtar shume te forte, gangasterin me te pashpirt te te gjitha galaktikave, Jaba The Hat.
programme.category: Nje shprese e re

programme.title: Gracka kohore
programme.desc: 2017. Një grup studentësh bllokohen në një shpellë misterioze ndërsa kërkojnë profesorin e zhdukur të arkeologjisë. Edhe pse pa asnjë shpresë shpëtimi, përpjeka për një rrugëdalje, i çon ata të zbulojnë legjendën më të lakmuar në histori...
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.title: Rrëmbimi
programme.desc: 1998. Mark Wahlberg. Per nje grusht para me shume, nje bande vrasesish me pagese, pa qene ne dijeni rrembejne nje vajze te ciles vete bosi i tyre i ish bere kumbare. Nga ky çast aventurat dhe te papriturat per ta s'do te rreshtin.
programme.category: Aksion
komedi

programme.title: I pandalshmi
programme.desc: Don Lee. Pasi një bandë famëkeqe kriminale rrëmben bashkëshorten e tij, një gangster legjendar në pension detyrohet të rikthehet në kriminelin e pandalshëm që ishte dikur për ta shpëtuar.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Misioni: Hakmarrja
programme.desc: Scott Adkins. I vendosur në kurth nga personi që besonte më shumë, një i dënuar i regjur arratiset nga burgu për t'u hakmarrë ndaj atyre që e kthyen atë në vrasës.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Legjenda e kalorësit
programme.desc: William, një shqytar i thjeshtë, merr identitetin e të zotit pas vdekjes së papritur të këtij të fundit për të treguar aftësitë e tij në garën e dyluftimeve të kalorësve më të mirë të vëndit.
programme.category: Aksion
Aventurë

programme.title: Sahara
programme.desc: 2005.Kjo eshte legjenda e nje thesari qe perpin gjithçka dhe gjithkend qe vihet ne kerkim te tij. Dy gjuetare thesaresh do te bashkohen me nje mjeke te bukur, dhe qe te tre do ta shohin veten ne nje gare marramendese kunder kohes.
programme.category: Aventurë

programme.title: Kundërgrushti
programme.desc: Bazuar në histori të vërtetë. Një boksier i ri, nga lagjet e varfëra të Majemit, me ëndrrën për të fituar Kampionatin e Dorezave të Arta, e gjen veten në udhekryq pasi diagnostifikohet me sëmundjen e bipolaritetit.
programme.category: Aksion
sport

programme.title: Misioni antiterror 2: Gjuetia
programme.desc: 2019. Kapiteni i një ekipi të forcave speciale kapet rob nga një organizatë terroriste. Anëtarët e ekipit organizojnë një mision të rrezikshëm shpëtimi dhe bashkojnë forcat t'i mbijetojnë misionit pa lënë asnjë ushtar tjetër pas.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Atila, mbreti i Hunëve
programme.desc: Gerard Butler, Simmone Mackinnon. I etur për të pushtuar toka të reja, Atila mbreti i hunëve, sulmon armikun më të rrezikshëm... perandorinë romake.
programme.category: Epik

programme.title: Kalëruesi i dallgëve
programme.desc: Gerard Butler, Jonny Weston. Historia e 15 vjeçarit Xhei Moriariti që kërkon ndihmën një serfisti legjendar për të kaluar dallgën më të famshme të oqeaneve, Maveriks...
programme.category: Biografi

programme.title: Devdas
programme.desc: Prodhim i vitit 2002. Shahrukh Khan, Aishwarya Rai. Ngjarjet zhvillohen në Indinë e viteve 1900 dhe portretizojnë dashurinë a pakrahasueshme të dy të rinjve, të cilët u ndanë për shkak të diferencave në klasën shoqërore.
programme.category: Një histori Indie

programme.desc: Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Seth Rogen. Bazuar në historinë e vërtetë të një djali 27-vjecar, i cili diagnostikohet me kancer të avancuar dhe e luftës se tij për të mbijetuar.
programme.category: Biorafi
dramë

programme.title: Dora e fundit
programme.desc: Famke Janssen. Një grua që përpiqet t'i shpëtojë të kaluarës dhe ish-burrit të saj, thur një komplot të rrezikshëm dhe detyrohet që të rrezikojë gjithçka në një lojë të fundit bastesh.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Faji Shkruar në Yje
programme.desc: 2014. Shailene Woodley, Ansel Elgort. Dy adoleshentë, të dy me sindroma të ndryshme kanceri, bien në dashuri me njëri tjetrin pasi takohen në një grup që mbështet të sëmurët me kancer.
programme.category: Drame
romance

programme.title: E vërteta...ai s'të ka qejf
programme.desc: Ben Affleck, Jennifer Aniston, Drew Barrymore. Një film mbi dashurinë dhe jetën në çift, mbi tentativat për të lexuar dhe zbërthyer sjelljet dhe marrëdhëniet njerëzore.
programme.category: Romancë

programme.title: Tara Road
programme.desc: A.Macdowell. Pas humbjes së djalit të saj, Marilyn vendos t'i japë një kthesë të re jetës së saj. Ajo njihet me Ria-n, e sapo braktisur nga i shoqi dhe të dyja shkëmbejnë shtepite. Ato duan qetesi, por ky shkembim do te dalë shume trondites.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Fjalor dashurie
programme.desc: Jessica Alba, Hugh Dancy. Kur Anglia sundonte botën, një njeri erdhi të mësonte qytetërimin. Një bukuroshe vendase duhet t'i mësonte gjuhën dhe zakonet, me kusht që të mos binte në dashuri me të.
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Dashuria të gjen vetë
programme.desc: Pasi një vazje të re e sektit fetar me rregulla strikte, Amish, i jepet mundësia të vizitojë botën jashtë qytezës së saj, ajo e gjen veten përballë një zgjedhjeje të vështirë dhe një njohjeje që mund t'i ndryshojë jetën.
programme.category: Dramë
romancë

programme.title: Streha e zemrës
programme.desc: Një adoleshente shtatzanë ikën nga nëna e saj abuzive për të kërkuar babane i cili e mohon gjithashtu. Ajo detyrohet të jetojë rrugëve deri ditën kur një i huaj i dhimbsur i ofron shpresë.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Të shfrenuarit
programme.desc: Bazuar në histori të vërtetë. Sarah, një 16-vjeçare e keqtrajtuar, dërgohet në një fermë për të mbijetuarit e abuzimit. Takimi me një kalë që ka patur një udhëtim të ngjashëm me të premton shërim, deri kur keqtrajtuesi i saj lirohet nga burgu...
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Hajduti i xhepave
programme.desc: Një hajdut xhepash njujorkez detyrohet të rivlerësojë zgjedhjet e tij në jetë, kur vajza me të cilën kishte kaluar një natë, i tregon se është në pritje të fëmijës së tij.
programme.category: Dramë
romancë

programme.title: Shikime të zbehta
programme.desc: Një çift i ri i dashurar mashtruesish nga Los Anxhelosi, udhëtojnë në një qytet të vogël në Teksas për të përvetësuar në mënyrë të rreme trashëgiminë e një të njohuri të vdekur.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Vrarë nga dashuria
programme.desc: Një vajzë e verbër, bie në dashuri me një djalë që punon si guidë turistike dhe duket sikur përmes tij, ajo mund të shohë botën. Por asgjë nuk është si duket dhe ai fsheh një sekret të errët, që mund t'i ndajë përgjithmonë.
programme.category: Një histori Indie

programme.title: Ana e errët e parajsës
programme.desc: Rory Culkin, Alec Baldwin. Jill Hennessy. Bazuar në jetën e regjisorit të filmit, Derick Martini. Një vështrim në anën e errët të ëndrrës amerikane dhe balancës delikate të jetës në familje, parë përmes syve të një 15 vjeçari.
programme.category: Portret familjar

programme.title: Biblioteka publike
programme.desc: Alec Baldwin, Emilio Estevez. Një mosbindje civile përshkallëzohet keqas kur një grup të pastrehësh refuzojnë të largohen nga Biblioteka publike, për t'i shpëtuar temperaturave të ulëta që kanë kapluar vendin.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Dashuria në menu
programme.desc: Për të shpëtuar restorantin e tij, një shef kuzhine me emër bën një marrëveshje pa dëshirë me drejtuesen e një kompanie ushqimesh të ngrira, por gjërat ndërlikohen më tej kur mes tyre lind një tërhqeje e papritur.
programme.category: Drame
romancë

programme.title: Shërbyesja nga Manhatani
programme.desc: Jennifer Lopez, Ralph Fiennes. Një kandidat për në senat bie në dashuri me një shërbyese hoteli, pasi gabimisht mendon se ajo është një vajzë e shtresës së lartë. Por zbulimi i profesionit të saj të vërtetë, rrezikon të shkatërrojë gjithçka...
programme.category: Romancë

programme.title: Elizabethtown
programme.desc: Orlando Bloom, Kirsten Dunst. Në ditën më të keqe të jetës së tij, një i ri njihet me një stjuardesë simpatike, plot gjallëri dhe që nga ky moment jeta e tij s'do të jetë më kurrë njësoj.
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Fushata
programme.desc: Steve Carell, Rose Byrne. Nje konsulent politik Demokrat përpiqet të ndihmojë një kandidat të fitojë zgjedhjet në një qytet të vogël republikan.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Një vajze e mirë si ty
programme.desc: Pas braktiset nga i dashuri i saj për mungesë të intimitetit, një violiniste krijon një listë të guximshme të gjërave që duhet të eksperimetojë në lidhje me seksin dhe nis një udhëtim të rrëmbyeshëm vetëzbulimi.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Pasagjerët
programme.desc: Chris Pratt, Jennifer Lawrence. Kandidat për 2 Oskar dhe 7 çmime të tjera! Një anije kozmike që po udhëton drejt një planeti të largët me mijëra njerëz në bord, pëson një avari që shkakton zgjimin nga gjumi të 2 njerëzve, 90 vite përpara se të arrijn.
programme.category: Fantashkencë
romancë

programme.desc: 2018. Fabrizio Bentivoglio. Një shkrimtar me emër dhe armik publik i internetit, me rastin e ditëlindjes mbledh familjen në shtëpinë e tij në mal. Kur grupi mbetet befasisht pa linjë interneti, të gjithë i kap paniku dhe pasojat do te jenë të paparas.

programme.desc: Në përmbyllje të sagës, Tomas udhëheq grupin e tij drejt misionit final. Për të shpëtuar miqtë e tyre, ata duhet të gjejnë një mënyrë që të hyjnë në labirintin legjendar 'Qyteti i fundit', më i rrezikshmi nga të gjithë larbirintët!

programme.title: Mbreti Luan

programme.title: Këpuca e Manitus
programme.desc: Një nga filmat më zbavitës, që të mban mbërthyer përpara ekranit me të qeshura dhe humor pa fund. Abahaçi dhe Range; shumë të ndryshëm, por vëllezër gjaku nisen në kërkim të një thesari, që do e ndryshojë jetën e tyre përgjithmonë.

programme.title: Zeniti i Shangait
programme.desc: 2000. Princesha e bukur Pei Pei eshte rrembyer. Gjurmet e rrembyesve shkojne ne Nevaden e larget. Chon Wang, roja perandorake eshte gati te shkoje deri ne fund te botes qe t'ia ktheje Pei Pei te atit Perandor!
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Besnikëri e lartë
programme.desc: John Cusack, Jack Black. Kur pronari i një dyqan disqesh braktiset nga e dashura, ai rishikon pesë ndarjet e tij më të rëndësishme, në përpjekje për të kuptuar se cili ishte gabimi që çoi në dështimin e lidhjeve.
programme.category: Komedi
romancë

programme.title: Çështje karme

programme.title: Më beso
programme.desc: Çarli lë punën për t'u bërë menaxheri i një grupi roku nga qyteti i tij i vogël i lindjes. Por angazhimi me grupin dhe problemet gjatë rrugës do ta detyrojnë të rivlerësojë edhe një herë prioritetet në jetën e tij.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Të fejohemi përkohësisht
programme.desc: Shane McRae, Aubrey Dollar. Miq gjithë jetën, një djalë dhe një vajzë pretendojnë që janë fejuar për t'i plotësuar dëshirën e fundit babait të tij. Por gjithçka del jashtë kontrollit, kur mes tyre fillojnë të lindin ndjenja të vërteta.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Rastësisht i gjithëpushtetshem
programme.desc: 2015. Simon Pegg, Kate Beckinsale. Disa jashtëtokësorë të prapë i japin një njeriu aftësinë për të bërë gjithçka që do, dhe mënyra si ai i përdor do të vendosë edhe fatin e Tokës.
programme.category: Komedi
fantashkencë

programme.title: Bodyguards: Truprojat
programme.desc: Christian De Sica, Massimo Boldi, Biagio Izzo. Pasi pushohen nga puna për paaftësinë e tyre, tre policë vendosin të fillojnë punë si truproja. Por edhe në këtë profesion, telashet dhe keqkuptimet nuk do t'ju ndahen...
programme.category: Komedia Italiane

programme.title: Desperados

programme.category: Komedi
romancë

programme.title: Mamma mia!
programme.desc: A Seyfried, M Streep, P Brosnan. Me shpresën se në ditën e dasmës do shoqërohet nga babai i saj i vërtetë, një vajzë e re fton 3 ish të dashurit e nënës së saj, pa e ditur cili është i duhuri. Gjithë historia tregohet nën tingujt e grupit ABBA.
programme.category: Komedi
muzikë

programme.title: Forca e muzikës
programme.desc: Kur një muzikant roku në moshë, humbet lidhjen me realitetin dhe fillon të prodhojë albume "unike", kompania e tij e menaxhimit dërgon një punonjës fillestar që t'i mbushë mendjen të firmosë një kontratë për ta hequr qafe...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Zemërthyeset
programme.desc: Regjia: David Mirkin; Aktorët: Sigourney Weaver, Jennifer Love. Një nënë dhe e bija në një lojë të piset dhe të rrezikshme me qellimin e vetem perfitimin.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Natën vonë
programme.desc: 2019. E.Thompson, M. Kaling. Prezantuesja legjendare e debateve televizive, Katherine, përballet me shikueshmëri të ulët dhe akuzën së është një grua që urren gratë. Kur ajo punëson gruan e parë dhe të vetme në stafin e saj, jeta i ndryshon plotësisht.
programme.category: Komedi
dramë

programme.title: Lindur për të qenë yll
programme.desc: Don Johnson, Christina Ricci. Jo të gjithë trashëgojnë talentin e prindërve, por kur Bucky mëson profesionin e vjetër të prindërve konservatorë, fiton besim dhe i drejtohet Los Anxhelosit që të ndjekë hapat e tyre...të bëhet aktor filmash porno.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Djem dhe vajza
programme.desc: F. Prinze Jr, C. Forlani. Xhenifer dhe Rajen njihen prej shumë kohësh. Në kolegj ata bëhen shokë të ngushtë, dalin, flasin dhe ngushëllojnë njëri-tjetrin. Pastaj për çudi ata kalojnë një natë bashkë... Kjo ndryshon çdo gjë.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Portorikanë në Paris
programme.desc: Luis Guzmán, Edgar Garcia. Dy policë nga Nju Jorku, shkojnë në Paris me një mision të fshehtë për të zbuluar një bandë që tregton çanta të falsifikuara...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Idhuj amerikane
programme.desc: Nje publicist ne menyre te deshperuar perpiqet te reklamoje nje film me autore kryesore ciftin me te famshem te botes se spektaklit, te cilet sapo kane perjetuar nje ndarje publike te ngaterruar.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Të ndërtosh një dashuri
programme.desc: 2019. Një vajzë nga qyteti që i kishte të gjitha, humbet gjithçka brenda pak kohësh. Ajo rrëmben mundësinë e një jete të re, kur rastësisht bëhet pronare e një bujtine në Zelandë të re, por gjërat nuk do të jenë aq të lehta sa duken...
programme.category: Komedi
romancë

programme.title: Vetëm ti

programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Provimi i pjekurisë 2
programme.desc: Raoul Bova, Barbora Bobulova, Ambra Angiolini, Luca Bizzarri. Pasi më në fund e morën provimin e maturës, miq te vjetër, pothuajse 40-të vjeçarë tashmë, vendosin të shkojnë një javë me pushime, në një nga ishujt më rinorë grekë...

programme.title: Sin City 2: Dama Vdekjeprurëse
programme.desc: Mickey Rourke, Jessica Alba. Bazuar në veprat e Frank Miller, dy histori klasike te tij, ndërthuren duke sjellë bashkë disa nga karakteret më të rrahur nga jeta, me disa nga njerëzit më të pashpirt në qytetin e mëkateve ...

thriller

programme.title: Dritare të hapura
programme.desc: Sasha Grey, Elijah Wood. Pasi pranon të spiunojë përmes kompjuterit aktoren e tij të preferuar, një njeri fut veten dhe atë në rrezik dhe të dy do ta gjejnë veten në një lojë të sëmurë ku askush nuk është si duket.

programme.title: Vrasja e parë

programme.title: Koherenca

fantashkencë

programme.title: Efekti Lazarus

fantashkencë

programme.title: Vendim tragjik
programme.desc: 2010.D. Mulroney, D. Kruger. Prokurori Stanton dhe gruaja e tij janë në pritje të ethshme për një dhurues të përshtatshëm për vajzën e sëmurë. Në garë me kohën, ai hidhet në kërkim të mjekut që mund ta shpëtojë, por do të gjejë më shumë se aq.

programme.title: Drakula: Historia e patreguar

programme.title: Argo
Argo
programme.desc:
Argo: Directed by Ben Affleck. With Ben Affleck, Bryan Cranston, Alan Arkin, John Goodman. Acting under the cover of a Hollywood producer scouting a location for a science fiction film, a CIA agent launches a dangerous operation to rescue six Americans in Tehran during the U.S. hostage crisis in Iran in 1979." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1024648/","name":"Argo","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzljNjY3MDYtYzc0Ni00YjU0LWIyNDUtNTE0ZDRiMGExMjZlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Acting under the cover of a Hollywood producer scouting a location for a science fiction film, a CIA agent launches a dangerous operation to rescue six Americans in Tehran during the U.S. hostage crisis in Iran in 1979.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1024648/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"chaos-rampant"},"dateCreated":"2013-01-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Operation: Dunces with Wolves","reviewBody":"Is there anything worse than competent mediocrity? Because, surely this is competent, perhaps more than competent, professional, well shot. I will put aside for the moment that there is no characterization to speak of here, that it is flimsy as procedural, that its politics are unnecessarily uncomplicated (good CIA battles evil Islam), its tone uncertain, with all the goofy movie-making stuff sticking out like a sore thumb. The film is soulless, painting by numbers. 

The movie was fake after all, but the mission was real.

In Affleck's case, there is something worse. Because you see, he does not attempt to 'write history with lightning', as was said about Birth of a Nation a century ago. He softly rewrites the thing. The Canadian stuff has (rightfully) received the most backlash. Imagine this—the CIA analyst who advised Affleck, there had to be one, thought it would be a good idea to end this insinuating the CIA did all the job, but graciously let Canada reap the publicity. 

But this was too blunt and it backfired, bringing to the fore the more subtle marginalization of Canadian intelligence work all through the film, which otherwise would have perhaps passed with little notice. The film after all establishes that the Canadian ambassador has taken the six in, even though in his fleeting screen time, he hovers about as a 'kindly concierge', as another reviewer put it.

You will see a more insidious version of this mentality in the opening few minutes of the film, sketching past US intervention in Iran—the film admits US backing of the Shah and his oppressive regime into power, human rights abuses and so on, but curiously, this part is mainly animated in the form of storyboards, mirroring those we see later of the fake film, as something near- mythical that happened in another time and world. Smart.

So, why the heck are we celebrating Affleck? The film shows him to be a blockhead who can put the camera sometimes in the right place."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":591648,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2012-11-21","keywords":"iran,hostage,u.s. embassy,escape,american embassy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Winner: Best Picture","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1537319449","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgxODY4NDUyM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDk1Nzg3Nw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgxODY4NDUyM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDk1Nzg3Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"As the Iranian revolution reaches a boiling point, a CIA 'exfiltration' specialist concocts a risky plan to free six Americans who have found shelter at the home of the Canadian ambassador. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000255/","name":"Ben Affleck"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0186505/","name":"Bryan Cranston"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000422/","name":"John Goodman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000255/","name":"Ben Affleck"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209646/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0184096/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006516/","name":"Chris Terrio"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5410196/","name":"Tony Mendez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2646452/","name":"Joshuah Bearman"}],"duration":"PT2H"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Lego Batman Movie
Lego Ninjago film
programme.desc:
The Lego Batman Movie: Directed by Chris McKay. With Will Arnett, Michael Cera, Rosario Dawson, Ralph Fiennes. A cooler-than-ever Bruce Wayne must deal with the usual suspects as they plan to rule Gotham City, while discovering that he has accidentally adopted a teenage orphan who wishes to become his sidekick." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4116284/","name":"The Lego Batman Movie","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcyNTEyOTY0M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTAyNzU3MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A cooler-than-ever Bruce Wayne must deal with the usual suspects as they plan to rule Gotham City, while discovering that he has accidentally adopted a teenage orphan who wishes to become his sidekick.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4116284/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CalRhys"},"dateCreated":"2017-02-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"An Enjoyable Ride Thrusting Us Back Into The Lego Universe","reviewBody":"Growing up, Lego meant everything to me, my aspirations of becoming an architect, and even the result of me studying design engineering in university, were all due to my fascination with Lego as a child and the complex structures you could craft and create. In 2014, upon the announcement of 'The Lego Movie', despite my love for the toy, I was kinda doubting the general premise. How could you make a movie out of Lego? Well, that question was soon answered as I gawped in awe at the screen, the movie was fantastic. Now, the character from 'The Lego Movie'' that garnered the most love was Batman, a cocky, sarcastic, childish take on the superhero we know and love... well it was only going to be a matter of time before he got his own motion picture.

'The Lego Batman Movie' was definitely an enjoyable ride, and whilst I think it lacks in comparison to its predecessor, it stills thrusts us back into the universe that we came to revere in 2014. With an admirable cast of voice talent, and stunning animated visuals, 'The Lego Batman Movie' boasts undeniable creative talent, but does at times seem to be trying a little too hard to be funny, building off the reputation the initial film garnered.

Is this film worth viewing? Most definitely, it's a hilarious feel- good animated comedy, and definitely perfect for the younger audience. I actually saw this film prior to its full release during a preview a few days early, however I believe it may have been aimed more as a kids matinée... I was literally the only adult there, shameful I know, but heck, I didn't care. The kids in the audience continually laughed with glee, so its definitely something suited for that kind of audience, but don't skip over the older adults who are still children at heart, it's an alluring comedy that piles on the laughs, definitely worth a watch."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":138543,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Action","Adventure"],"datePublished":"2017-02-09","keywords":"lego,batmobile,dc comics,based on comic book,batman character","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Extended TV Spot","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi466269721","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY0NTAyMDA5NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODM2NzM4MDI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY0NTAyMDA5NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODM2NzM4MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"There are big changes brewing in Gotham, and if Batman wants to save the city from the Joker's hostile takeover, he may have to drop the lone vigilante thing, try to work with others, and maybe learn to lighten up."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004715/","name":"Will Arnett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0148418/","name":"Michael Cera"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0206257/","name":"Rosario Dawson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003021/","name":"Chris McKay"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005154/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0283444/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0602537/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0334381/","name":"Seth Grahame-Smith"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0571344/","name":"Chris McKenna"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1273099/","name":"Erik Sommers"}],"duration":"PT1H44M"}</script><metacontent="

Lego Film 2
programme.desc:
The Lego Movie 2: The Second Part: Directed by Mike Mitchell. With Chris Pratt, Elizabeth Banks, Will Arnett, Tiffany Haddish. It's been five years since everything was awesome and the citizens are facing a huge new threat: Lego Duplo invaders from outer space, wrecking everything faster than they can rebuild." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3513498/","name":"The Lego Movie 2: The Second Part","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyOTkwNDc1N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzkyMzk3NjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"It's been five years since everything was awesome and the citizens are facing a huge new threat: Lego Duplo invaders from outer space, wrecking everything faster than they can rebuild.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3513498/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"thirtyfivestories"},"dateCreated":"2019-02-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Everything is Less Awesome","reviewBody":"Five years removed from the infectious first installment, comes a serviceable extension of a story that already had a proper ending. The subtitle The Second Part is surely a half truth considering how this narrative slapped together by the original writers Christopher Miller and Phil Lord seems tacked on in a "Oh let's take a victory lap then" sense. The new director Mike Mitchell is planted into a zero sum game as he tries to reignite the novelty of the first film while propelling a more mature plot that Miller and Lord insisted on being needlessly convoluted. This sequel comes off as a afterthought worthy to stand beside the other spinoff LEGO films, but lacks all of the magic of its predecessor.

The magic present in The LEGO Movie resides in the playful allegory of capitalism mixed with the earned nostalgia of the animation's medium. Not to mention the brilliant reveal of a child's imagination directing the entire story. These are all elements revisited the second time around, but the trick has already been explained by the magician. The world of Brickville goes through sufficient changes almost immediately once toddler-sized LEGO creations attack with unrivaled fury. The brick civilization reverts to a Mad Max world after the invincible fat-bricked organisms regularly search and destroy anything colorful or shiny.

Through some less-than-subtle live action mirage shots early in the film, its apparent that Finn (Jadon Sand) the boy mastermind in the first film is being plagued by his younger sister Bianca (Brooklynn Prince). Her entry-level LEGO creations clash with his more involved and complex structures, and the result is a sibling pair never learning to play in symbiosis. Of course this conflict is merely implied before the lazy live action finale that resolves the paper thin dispute, and wholly lacks the gusto of the first movie's twist. The jig is already up from scene one of the sequel, because we are aware of the children's narrative dictatorship, so none of the LEGO characters' sentience ever feels authentic.

Chris Pratt returns to voice Emmet a happy-go-lucky construction worker who retains a life of cheer in the apocalyptic wasteland. Elizabeth Banks also reprises her role as Lucy, the brawn and brains to Emmet's fumbling optimism. Lucy desperately attempts to calibrate Emmet's persona to something more appropriate to the ruined world they now live in, but he maintains the "everything is awesome" outlook that figures problematic in a much more adult environment. In a hardly tongue-in-cheek fashion, a character outright states the thesis of the movie to be "a statement on the waning affects of adolescence on imagination." This stands as the most egregious example of "meta exploitation," but several runner ups tail close behind.

Falling victim to exhausting cleverness, LEGO Movie 2 doesn't know when to edit its goofs. When you merely reformat the first film's plot to fit another child builder, new additions need to elevate the otherwise regurgitated formula. These additions include ramping up the meta meter to 11 and including two more banger tracks to hopefully burrow into the viewers' minds. The main attraction song here has a hook the repeats endlessly, "This song's gonna get stuck inside your head." Oh and I mustn't forget the cameos, which come with This is the End regularity, and if you can imagine, with far less originality.

I didn't waste your time by running you down a plot synopsis for good reason. The film plays with your expectations in a cheap and unearned fashion without offering any reasonable explanation upon the conclusion other than, "We just wanted to plant red herrings, because...reasons." Screenwriters will go to great (and absurd) lengths to make an unoriginal script appear more interesting. This parasitic sequel will deliver many chuckles and feels to audiences that have already surrendered to the committee-made trajectory of the LEGO universe, but I feel somber for those choosing to double feature this lackadaisical copy with its bold predecessor.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":60566,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2019-02-07","keywords":"lego,sequel,queen,spaceship,vampire","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2788407833","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmE3ZmYwNTgtNTBmOC00NGU1LWJjNzktOTVhMjEzODFmOGFlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXdhZHppdGE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmE3ZmYwNTgtNTBmOC00NGU1LWJjNzktOTVhMjEzODFmOGFlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXdhZHppdGE@._V1_.jpg","description":"It's been five years since everything was awesome and the citizens are facing a huge new threat: LEGO DUPLO invaders from outer space, wrecking everything faster than they can rebuild. The battle to defeat them and restore harmony to the LEGO universe will take Emmet, Lucy, Batman and their friends to faraway, unexplored worlds, including a strange galaxy where everything is a musical. It will test their courage, creativity and Master Building skills, and reveal just how special they really are."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0695435/","name":"Chris Pratt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006969/","name":"Elizabeth Banks"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004715/","name":"Will Arnett"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593610/","name":"Mike Mitchell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0468593/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0602537/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0520488/","name":"Phil Lord"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0588087/","name":"Christopher Miller"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3821363/","name":"Matthew Fogel"}],"duration":"PT1H47M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Dark Knight Rises
Vitez tame: Povratak
programme.desc:
The Dark Knight Rises: Directed by Christopher Nolan. With Christian Bale, Gary Oldman, Tom Hardy, Joseph Gordon-Levitt. Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1345836/","name":"The Dark Knight Rises","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk4ODQzNDY3Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODA0NTM4Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1345836/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Joaquin_Collete"},"dateCreated":"2012-07-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Stunning Conclusion to an Epic Trilogy","reviewBody":"Not being a huge fan of superhero movies, I didn't have much expectations for Batman Begins. However viewing the 2005 Christopher Nolan production, I was pleasantly shocked. Then after my huge expectations for, "The Dark Knight", Christopher Nolan blew my expectations to the dust. Will the same happen with the 3rd and last film, "The Dark Knight Rises"? Quite simply, Yes! My big expectations were once again, blown away. What a production! This is a true cinematic experience, to behold. The movie exceeded my expectations in terms of action, and entertainment. The editing, sound, score, visuals, direction and action are all top notch. 

The film contains a fine cast of talented actors. Christian Bale, of course still makes is a great Batman. Michael Cain is fantastic, as he always is. He gives such a powerful performance, he really ought to be considered for an Oscar nomination. Tom Hardy as Bane is utterly terrifying, at times, and completely ominous. Anne Hathaway as Catwoman/Selina Kyle is a scene stealer. She is completely engrossing. Everyone is so great, the dynamic scenes between the actors are so well done, so well written, and so well directed. The Dark Knight Rises is is emotionally riveting and amazing to view.

At a running time of almost 3 hours, the film never becomes dull, which is pretty impressive. The movie's action sequences are spectacularly well created and very intense. The dialogue between the character's are intelligent and highly believable. The movie's soundtrack is terrific and really exemplify's many of the movie's scenes. Extremely well editing and sound use really develop many of the movie's action scenes, so it's not just explosions and visuals like in many other movies. Nolan creates a grand, dirty, engrossing world, and his action sequences just hum. 

In conclusion, this film is a gorgeous reminder that great writing and direction can enhance any movie-going experience, even superhero movies, which are usually thought of as mindless entertainment. I am wholly satisfied with Christopher Nolan's vision and thank all who worked on this film for bringing such an intricate interpretation of its very famous literary source. I cannot recommend this film anymore than I have, I just have to say everyone and anyone should see it. 10/10"","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1585222,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Crime"],"datePublished":"2012-08-15","keywords":"dc comics,batman character,bruce wayne character,terrorist plot,sequel","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"4K Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi144884505","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGIwYmIwNWYtNzkxZC00YTdmLWI2NmMtYzA0ODZkNTNlZWMwXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFuaW5vc2M@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGIwYmIwNWYtNzkxZC00YTdmLWI2NmMtYzA0ODZkNTNlZWMwXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFuaW5vc2M@._V1_.jpg","description":"Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000288/","name":"Christian Bale"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0362766/","name":"Tom Hardy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004266/","name":"Anne Hathaway"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0634240/","name":"Christopher Nolan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0159111/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0283444/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0634300/","name":"Jonathan Nolan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0634240/","name":"Christopher Nolan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0275286/","name":"David S. Goyer"}],"duration":"PT2H44M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Axios
programme.desc: Dobitnik Emmyja Matthew O'Neill i Perri Peltz režiraju i produciraju limitiranu dokumentarnu seriju s vijestima, orijentiranim specijalima nove medijske tvrtke Axios. Dobitnik Emmyja Matthew O'Neill i Perri Peltz režiraju i produciraju limitiranu dokumentarnu seriju s vijestima, orijentiranim specijalima nove medijske tvrtke Axios. O'Neilll i Peltz rade s vodećim Axiosovim novinarima kako bi stavili naglasak na politiku, biznis i tehnologiju sljedećeg tjedna - kao i velike teme koje oblikuju budućnost. Svako izdanje AXIOS-a pokriva aktualni veliki problem iza kojeg slijede kratki dokumentarci, poučni intervjui s važnim osobama te pouzdani uvidi preneseni AXIOS-ovom tipičnom "inteligentnom jezgrovitošću" u sažetom, djeljivom formatu.

programme.title: Sex and the City 2
Sex i grad 2
programme.desc:
Sex and the City 2: Directed by Michael Patrick King. With Sarah Jessica Parker, Kristin Davis, Cynthia Nixon, Kim Cattrall. While wrestling with the pressures of life, love, and work in Manhattan, Carrie, Miranda, and Charlotte join Samantha for a trip to Abu Dhabi (United Arab Emirates), where Samantha's ex is filming a new movie." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1261945/","name":"Sex and the City 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM3OTUyNTI3MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODcyMzM0Mw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"While wrestling with the pressures of life, love, and work in Manhattan, Carrie, Miranda, and Charlotte join Samantha for a trip to Abu Dhabi (United Arab Emirates), where Samantha's ex is filming a new movie.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1261945/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"hkramb-1"},"dateCreated":"2010-05-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Like my best friend just slapped me and stole my wallet","reviewBody":"Went into this not expecting much, the premise seemed off but wanted to see my old friends. I told myself everything you're telling yourself, well the fashion will be fun...there should be some funny stuff...might get to see a hot naked guy. I had no idea I'd robbed of my ticket money and insulted for 2 1/2 hours.

I loved the series, seen every show at least 6-7 times. I thought the first movie was a little disappointing, not very much depth, just wallowing and moping for most of it.

The new movie is just an exercise in self indulgence and complaining about problems that aren't really problems. Charlotte complaining about how hard it is to be her when she has a nanny AND a housekeeper. Miranda complaining that her boss doesn't like her. Carrie complaining that Big puts a TV in the bedroom. Samantha complaining about her hormones. I just kept thinking "are you kidding me?? This passes for dialogue??". That's all in the first 8 minutes and it's just downhill from there. I'm just disgusted.

Best part of the movie? The preview for the new Rachel McAdams film that came on right before it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":76728,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2010-06-02","keywords":"sexually empowered woman,promiscuous woman,sex comedy,kissing a married woman,sex in bed","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Sex and the City -- Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi196609817","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzY4NjUzMzgyNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDg5NTMyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzY4NjUzMzgyNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDg5NTMyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Sex and the City -- Trailer #2"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000572/","name":"Sarah Jessica Parker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000326/","name":"Kim Cattrall"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004862/","name":"Kristin Davis"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0455078/","name":"Michael Patrick King"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005861/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0455078/","name":"Michael Patrick King"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0124299/","name":"Candace Bushnell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0823015/","name":"Darren Star"}],"duration":"PT2H26M"}</script><metacontent="
